sentences.english: Star Wars are closely linked to conventional ground-combat.
sentences.chinese: 星球大戰與地面常規作戰之間有着密切的聯繫。

sentences.english: After World War I, Syria became a French mandate.
sentences.chinese: 第一次世界大戰後，敘利亞成了法國的託管地。

sentences.english: He entertains the belief that the second world war is inevitable before 1936.
sentences.chinese: 他相信1936年以前第二次世界大戰是不能避免的。

sentences.english: Fett was one of the best Star Wars character.
sentences.chinese: 我一直以爲波巴費特是最佳的星球大戰人物之一。

sentences.english: “In Stars Wars, the Death Star died twice, ” Willard continued.
sentences.chinese: 他接着說在《星球大戰》中，死亡之星死了兩次。

sentences.english: Japanese-Americans were rounded up and interned during World War II.
sentences.chinese: 第二次世界大戰期間，日本裔美國人遭到集體關押。

sentences.english: After the war came the problem of rehabilitation.
sentences.chinese: 大戰以後接着而來的是重建問題。

sentences.english: I really want to watch "star wars" on the opening day.
sentences.chinese: 我真的很想在首映那天看“星球大戰”。

sentences.english: It became the most successful bomber used in World War One.
sentences.chinese: 成了第一次世界大戰中戰功最卓著的一種轟炸機。

sentences.english: The custom began during the Second World War.
sentences.chinese: 這種習俗始於第二次世界大戰期間。

sentences.english: Use my three-step guide to create your battle-the-winter plan.
sentences.chinese: 用我的三步法指導你制定大戰冬季的計劃。

sentences.english: 1942- the World War Two siege of Bataan began.
sentences.chinese: 1942年的今天，第二次世界大戰，開始圍攻巴丹。

sentences.english: This was taken just before Newcastle's massive home game with Middlesbrough.
sentences.chinese: 圖片攝於紐卡主場對陣米堡的生死大戰前。

sentences.english: The action of this movie takes place prior to W. W. Il.
sentences.chinese: 這場電影的發生在二次世界大戰前。

sentences.english: The division of the city grew out of the zones of occupation established at the end of World War II.
sentences.chinese: 二次大戰結束時形成的戰領區導致了該城的分裂。

sentences.english: Multiplayer Spades, Backgammon, Hearts, Checkers, and Reversi.
sentences.chinese: 多玩家黑桃王，雙陸棋，紅心大戰，跳棋和翻轉棋。
